ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.title: Pipe Dreams [--管道梦--]
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests19.s: Pipes are for suckers[-管道就是用来吸~的--]
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests19.d: &bLaser Nodes&r can interact with adjacent inventories using &6Cards&r. Insert a Card into the side of the Node that's facing the block.[--&b激光节点&r可以使用&6卡片&r与相邻的容器进行交互.将卡片插入面向方块的那面.--]
In the Node's GUI, right-click a Card to configure it. This GUI is fairly complex, so reading &6LaserIO 101&r is highly recommended.[--在节点界面中,右键点击卡片进行配置。界面相当复杂,所以高度推荐阅读&6LaserIO 101&r.--]
When a Card is set to extract, items etc are sent to any Cards on its network and &6channel&r that are set to Insert.[--当卡片设置为提取时,物品等将被发送到网络上和&6通道&r上设置为插入的任何卡.--]
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests20.d: &bItem Cards&r allow Laser Nodes to &6move items&r.[--&b物品卡&r允许激光节点&6运输物品&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests21.d: &bFluid Cards&r allow Laser Nodes to &6move liquids&r.[--&b流体卡&r允许激光节点&6运输液体&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests22.d: &bEnergy Cards&r allow Laser Nodes to &6move energy&r.[--&b能量卡&r允许激光节点&6运输能量&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests23.d: &bCard Overclockers&r make Cards work faster.[--&b物流卡超频器&r可以让卡片工作得更快.--]
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests24.d: &bNode Overclockers&r let more Cards work at the same time.[--&b节点超频器&r可以让更多卡同时工作.--]
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests25.d: &bFilters&r can be inserted into Cards to filter what they move.[--&b过滤器&r可以插入卡片里过滤它们运输的东西.--]
